tool_description: Analyzes journal entry text to determine emotional tone and mood, providing mood tags and sentiment scores.

entry_text.description: The journal entry text to analyze for mood and sentiment

sentiment_scale.description: Sentiment scoring scale: binary, five_point, ten_point

error_messages: Empty entry text: Provide non-empty text content for mood analysis.
Invalid sentiment scale: Use one of [binary, five_point, ten_point].
Invalid mood categories: Provide mood categories as an array of strings.
usage: Provide entry_text for mood analysis. Optionally specify mood_categories to focus on particular emotions and set sentiment_scale for granularity. Returns mood tags and numerical sentiment scores.

primary_mood.description: The dominant mood detected in the entry

mood_tags.description: All mood tags identified in the text

sentiment_score.description: Overall sentiment score based on selected scale
